document_data.name: Nlossae
document_data.symbol: Five golden butterflies set against a quartered field (black, white, blue, green), with one on each quarter and one at the intersection.
document_data.History: House Nlossae was believed by the [[Srinshee]] to be young yet powerful upstarts who would glory in breaking the power of the more established houses as of {{yearlink|241}}.
